614200.name: H-Hour: World's Elite - Custom Workshop Maps
614200.description:
This is a free DLC pack created from the best submissions of custom workshop maps in our curated Workshop.

We have a strong community of mappers who are pleased to offer free custom maps for use by H-Hour: World's Elite players. In recognition of the quality content created by our custom mappers, we are offering this free DLC pack to all who own our game. The community custom map pack will contain content ranging from original maps to re-creations of old but beloved SOCOM maps. The DLC will be updated in line with our patch releases to provide everyone with the latest map updates and new content.

Enjoy!
614200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
